metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10892 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The default OCI linux spec in oci/defaults{_linux}.go in Docker/Moby from 1.11 to current does not block /proc/acpi pathnames. The flaw allows an attacker to modify host's hardware like enabling/disabling bluetooth or turning up/down keyboard brightness.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10892` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 18.06.1-0ubuntu1~16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '18.06.1-0ubuntu1~16.04.2').
